document_data.name: Ignar Turc Abolin
document_data.mainbody: '''Ignar Turc Abolin''' was a [[mage]] from [[Kara-Tur]] who inhabited the [[Battle of Bones]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Description: Ignar was gaunt and always garbed in dark robes that shielded his face.
document_data.Abilities: Ignar was rumored to be a [[lich]] and possessed considerable magical power.
document_data.Possessions: Known magical items in Ignar's possession were a ''[[wand of frost]]'', ''[[ring of free action]]'', and a ''[[ring of invisibility]]''.
document_data.Activities: It was rumored that Ignar was fascinated by flora, particularly roses. It was possible that he was the creator of the mysterious [[Rose Garden]] that was located within the Battle of Bones.
